body_html: Well, I remember back then I write a simple script that call slice on both sides of equal sign to convince myself this works, don't know how I got it worked out. As for the slice assignment problem, I've tackled it through assignment per element in a cuda kernel. Hope this helpful for other people who are possibly puzzled on same problem.

body: Well, I remember back then I write a simple script that call slice on both sides of equal sign to convince myself this works, don't know how I got it worked out. As for the slice assignment problem, I've tackled it through assignment per element in a cuda kernel. Hope this helpful for other people who are possibly puzzled on same problem.
